availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, farmer. Todd County native. Son of John Latham and Susan Brock Latham. Married Emily L. Gibson Latham on September 17, 1849 in Todd County. Father of George N. T. Latham, Ladonia Latham, John W. Latham, T. S. Latham, Belzary Latham, and David S. Latham. Member of the Methodist Episcopal Church. Farmer in Todd County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, Unnamed District, p. 213 B; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, Unnamed District, p. 39; J. H. Battle, ed., County of Todd, Kentucky: Historical and Biographical (Chicago and Louisville: F. A. Battey Publishing Co., 1884), 275-76.
